stories.body_en: In response to the increasingly complex challenges of climate change, researchers have developed an innovative metric that provides crucial insights into water dynamics on our planet. Although implementing this metric requires international collaboration and access to sophisticated satellite data, the potential benefits for water resource planning are significant. Environmental organizations hope that this scientific advancement will contribute to more effective adaptation and mitigation policies regarding climate change, allowing governments to make more informed decisions regarding sustainable water management.

stories.summary_es: Profesionales de la gastronom√≠a revelan en redes sociales los platos que evitan pedir en restaurantes, bas√°ndose en su experiencia y conocimiento sobre preparaci√≥n culinaria e higiene alimentaria.
stories.body_es: A trav√©s de discusiones en Reddit, profesionales de la industria gastron√≥mica han compartido sus opiniones sobre los platos que estrat√©gicamente evitan ordenar en restaurantes. Sus revelaciones ofrecen perspectivas fascinantes sobre c√≥mo el conocimiento culinario influye en las decisiones de consumo. stories.body_en: Through discussions on Reddit, professionals in the gastronomy industry have shared their opinions about dishes they strategically avoid ordering in restaurants. One of the most mentioned aspects is distrust toward dishes that require complicated preparation in high-demand contexts, since time pressure can compromise quality. Likewise, many sector workers avoid products from low seasons, suspecting that ingredients might not be fresh. Frozen seafood, when not explicitly declared, represents a recurring concern due to potential cold chain problems. Some professionals express skepticism toward dishes that attempt to disguise lower-quality ingredients through elaborate sauces. They equally advise against ordering specials based on ingredients whose origins they do not know. This information, though anecdotal, reflects how professional experience can shape critical perspectives regarding food safety norms and culinary standards. Although not all restaurants present these deficiencies, the criteria of these experts underscores the importance of transparency in food preparation.
